products.name: Brown square box
products.description: This is a strong brown box with a square shape. It is great for storing small items like cookies, jewelry, or gifts. It is made from eco-friendly material.

products.name: White box
products.description: This white box is simple and elegant. It is perfect for packing small gifts, cakes, or pastries. The clean look makes it suitable for any occasion.

products.name: Pink box
products.description: This pink box looks pretty and stylish. It is good for packing small gifts, makeup items, or chocolates. Its soft color makes it ideal for birthdays or special occasions.

products.name: Box
products.description: This is a simple and plain box that can be used for many purposes. It works well for packing small to medium-sized items like toys or snacks.

products.name: Bread box
products.description: This is a spacious bread box designed to keep bread fresh. It is perfect for bakeries or homes. The sturdy material ensures the bread stays safe and protected.

products.name: Brown box
products.description: This is a large brown box made for storing heavy items. It is durable and ideal for carrying things like books, clothes, or groceries.

products.name: Round box
products.description: This is a small round box that looks neat and compact. It is great for storing candies, chocolates, or small accessories like earrings or rings.

products.name: Pink rectangle box
products.description: This is a beautiful pink rectangular box. It is perfect for organizing items like stationery, ribbons, or small toys. It is sturdy and reusable.
